nodes.text: Battle Station Command was a group of officers that headed the Battle Station Operations branch of the Imperial Military, commanding siege weapons like the Death Stars. It answered to Imperial Central Command.[source?]
General Hurst Romodi was appointed by Grand Moff Wilhuff Tarkin as chief of Battle Station Operations in the first Death Star.

Titus Klev was assigned to Battle Station Operations but only served in Dedicated Siege Platforms and orbital bases, rising through the ranks of Battle Station Command some time after the Battle of Endor.
